thread.section_title: Flashbay Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Flashbay | www.flashbay.com
thread.title: Keith - Playvue Games
thread.title_full: Flashbay reviewed by Keith - Playvue Games

author: Keith - Playvue Games
title: Keith - Playvue Games
text:
This is our third time using Flashbay as our USB drive provider of choice and the level of both service and quality of product continues to exceed our experience with their competitors.
Mike is great to work with and our quoting, proofing, ordering and delivery process has never been this easy.
